comment:
A few notes on this.  I only got 3.9oz of hops off the vine and after looking in them I realize these are Cascades and not Centennial (mixup when receiving hop bines).  I added these at flame out and did a 24 minute hop stand until I hit about 180F then put into ice bath.
Tasted a bit sweet but who knows.  This should be a pretty bitter IPA.  The aroma was good and the freshly picked hops had amazing smell and quite a bit of yellow Lupulin in them...
